about_me: Hello, I am Abolfazl Nasibi, AKA. Erfan Nasibi. At 21 years of age, I currently live in Iran and am pursuing a degree in Computer Science at Guilan University. My fascination with computers began in childhood, initially sparked by an interest in video games. Over time, this enthusiasm evolved into a passion for programming, software development, and the ever-expanding field of artificial intelligence.
